ResearchProjectDef.label: invoke void ally
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that invokes a dark ally from the void to assist you.

ResearchProjectDef.label: invoke eclipse
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that shrouds the colony in darkness.

ResearchProjectDef.label: healing pulse
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that improves wound healing for your colonists.

ResearchProjectDef.label: immunity pulse
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that improves immunity gain for your colonists.

ResearchProjectDef.label: inhumanization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that strips you of your humanity, in favor of damp comfort and nulled pain.

ResearchProjectDef.label: regenerative chant
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that attempts to heal the wounds of the target.

ResearchProjectDef.label: skip migration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that relocates your entire colony somewhere on the planet.

ResearchProjectDef.label: void cleanse
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that frees an individual from the firm hold of the void.

ResearchProjectDef.label: void-touch transfer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that transfers the mark of the void onto another host.

ResearchProjectDef.label: withering chant
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that causes enemies in the region to wither away.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bioshredding
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that shreds a target, leaving nothing but bioferrite in its place.

ResearchProjectDef.label: shard reaping
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that manifests dark archotech shards in exchange for an offering of bioferrite.
